channel.title: Another stupid "Meaning of the song" thread!
channel.description:
Alright, so i'm pretty sure sppt will understand the meaning of these lyrics.
I posted this to prove that Death Metal isn't what the majority of people's stereotype claims it to be. (and YES, you can actually hear what he sings in the songs, cause he's not "grunting", he is using a technique of growl which is pretty clear compared to most bands)
The song is Death - In Human Form
[code]People of the earth beware, It is here in human form An atrocity laced with greed. Filled with evil intentions. Ready to attack [Lead: Andy]
Look to the air for stories to choose, Who will be your next victim Profitting on visions of others, dark emotions run through its veins Its motives are false its mind is insane A distant planet with no signs of life To become a home for this alien breed. Scientists of the world unite, your services are more than needed This creature in human form is out of control [Lead: Chuck]
Looks can be deceiving, see beyond the shell Flesh and eyes mean nothing. The truth, time it will tell Before you think you fool the world. What comes around goes around. Shown for what you are, a waste of life [Lead: Andy][/code]
I am pretty much aware of what it's about, how about you?

item.title: Another stupid "Meaning of the song" thread!
item.dc:creator: @Razr Razr
item.source: Another stupid "Meaning of the song" thread!

item.title: Another stupid "Meaning of the song" thread!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Razr, post:7, topic:233472”][quote author=sppt link=topic=307917.msg2461898#msg2461898 date=1222520759]
Politics, and to be more specific: america’s politics.
And I’d have to agree with the lyrics <3 chuck

That’s a good question cause if it is its about George bush

It was written in 1993
[/quote]

Oh woops lol but eh close enough it involved politics[/quote]Yes, as does most of their songs. It’s either about politics or religion. Here’s a another example which is about the greed and power of religion in america.

From the song “Crystal Mountain”:

[code]Built from blind faith
Passed down from self-induced fantasy
Turn a page to justify
Conjuring power - it opens wide
On your seventh day,
is that how it’s done?
Twisting your eyes to perceive
all that you want
To assume from ignorance
Inflicting wounds with your
cross-turned dagger

[Chorus:]
Inside crystal mountain
Evil takes its form
Inside crystal mountain
Commandments are reborn

All the traps are set to confine
All who get in the way of the divine
In sight and in mind of the hypocrite
A slave to the curse forever confined

[Solo: Schuldiner]

Shatter the myth
Don’t cut yourself
On your words against
dreams made of steel
Stronger than any faith
That inflicts pain and fear,
is that how it’s done?
Twisting your eyes to perceive
all that you want
To assume from ignorance
Inflicting wounds with your
cross-turned dagger[/code]

Read full topic

Alright, so i’m pretty sure sppt will understand the meaning of these lyrics.

I posted this to prove that Death Metal isn’t what the majority of people’s stereotype claims it to be. (and YES, you can actually hear what he sings in the songs, cause he’s not “grunting”, he is using a technique of growl which is pretty clear compared to most bands)

The song is Death - In Human Form

[code]People of the earth beware,
It is here in human form
An atrocity laced with greed.

[Lead: Andy]

Look to the air for stories to choose,

dark emotions run through its veins
